name: Next.js Route Handler SSE 最小
description: text/event-stream でサーバー送信イベントを返す最小例

files.template: export async function GET(){ const stream = new ReadableStream({ start(c){ c.enqueue(new TextEncoder().encode('data: hello\n\n')); c.close(); } }); return new Response(stream, { headers: { 'Content-Type': 'text/event-stream' } }); }
